intro: Pentacalia lewisii, commonly known as Lewis's pentacalia, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun, often found in desert or arid environments. Pentacalia lewisii is adapted to withstand drought and extreme temperatures, making it a resilient species in its native habitat.
